item.title: About Custom Dashboard Tiles
item.description: Dashboard Tiles are customizable sets of filters for your DefectDojo instance, which can be added to your üè† Home dashboard. Tiles are designed to provide relevant information and speed up navigation within DefectDojo.

item.title: How-To: Add, Edit or Delete Dashboard Tiles
item.description: Custom Dashboard Tiles can be added, edited or deleted by any user with Superuser Permissions. Adding a new Dashboard Tile New Dashboard tiles can be added by opening the + (plus icon)menu on the Dashboard.

item.title: How-To: Edit Dashboard Configuration
item.description: Superusers can choose which Metrics Charts are displayed on the Dashboard. To do this, select the Edit Dashboard Configuration option from the top-right hand gear menu.

item.title: Introduction to Dashboard Features
